meanings: a base, a foundation, a source
absurd, ridiculous, unreasonable, outrageous, ludicrous, (formal) preposterous

vlive.korean: [여기 있을 법한데] 너무 번호가 터무니없었어, 비밀번호가... [Something should be here] The password was out of nowhere. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.18 노래방탈출 #2 (Escape Singing Room #2)
vlive.english: [Something should be here] The password was out of nowhere.

vlive.korean: 터 - 터무니없는 소리! Tor! - Absurd noise! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 지금까지 이런 주접은 없었다. 이것은 MX인가 MBB인가❓ (MONSTA X talking about each other’s compliments)
너무 터무니가 없네요. 죄송합니다. That's absurd. I'm sorry. 듣기 View video LEE DONG WOOK : [Full]이동욱의 On the air (LEE DONG WOOK's On the air)
소머리국밥이 더 터무니없다. But "ox head rice soup" was more nonsensical. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 멜론뮤직어워드 레드카펫
vlive.english: But "ox head rice soup" was more nonsensical.

vlive.korean: 터무니 없는 것도 괜찮아요? - 응. It might sound ridiculous, is it alright? - Yes. 듣기 View video MAP6 : <맵식스는 열일중 !>
vlive.english: It might sound ridiculous, is it alright? - Yes.

examples.korean: Some of his suggestions verged on the outrageous. 발음듣기 그의 제안들 중 일부는 거의 터무니없을 정도였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some of his suggestions verged on the outrageous. 발음

examples.korean: She enjoys shocking people by saying outrageous things. 발음듣기 그녀는 터무니없는 말들을 해서 사람들에게 충격을 주는 것을 즐긴다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She enjoys shocking people by saying outrageous things. 발음

examples.korean: She says the most outrageous things sometimes. 발음듣기 그녀는 가끔 아주 터무니없는 말을 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She says the most outrageous things sometimes. 발음

examples.korean: Reports that he has resigned are nonsense. 발음듣기 그가 사직했다는 보도는 터무니없는 말이다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Reports that he has resigned are nonsense. 발음

examples.korean: She has an illogical fear of insects. 발음듣기 그녀는 곤충들에 대해 터무니없는 공포심을 갖고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has an illogical fear of insects. 발음
